Trade/Device Name(s): Emit II Plus 6-AM / Ecstasy Calibrator / Control Level 1
Emit II Plus 6-AM / Ecstasy Calibrator / Control Level 2
Emit II Plus 6-AM / Ecstasy Calibrator / Control Level 3
Emit II Plus 6-AM / Ecstasy Calibrator / Control Level 4
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Emit II Plus 6-Acetylmorphine Assay and multi-level Ecstasy Calibrators/Controls for qualitative/semiquantitative detection of 6-acetylmorphine and MDMA in urine using enzyme immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative and/or semiquantitative detection of 6-acetylmorphine (heroin metabolite) in human urine using chemistry analyzers; calibrators and controls used for calibration and quality control of 6-Acetylmorphine and Ecstasy assays.
